title: My Favorite Food
text: I love food! My favorite food is pizza. I like pizza with cheese and tomatoes. I eat pizza every Friday with my family. For breakfast, I usually eat cereal with milk. Sometimes I have toast with jam. I drink orange juice in the morning. For lunch at school, I have a sandwich and an apple. I don't like vegetables very much, but my mum says they are healthy. I also love ice cream. Chocolate ice cream is the best!
